sections.section_instructions:
The Reading Passage has 8 paragraphs labelled A-H.

Which paragraph contains the following information?

Write the correct letter A-H in boxes.

NB You may use any letter more than once.

questions.question_text: The difference between current and past records on penguin population.
Places where people cannot go to.
Factors contributing to the decline in the amount of food available.

sections.section_instructions:
Do the following statements agree with the information given in Reading Passage?

In boxes 21-23 on your answer sheet, choose:

TRUE if the statement agrees with the information
FALSE if the statement contradicts the information
NOT GIVEN if there is no information on this

questions.question_text: The IUCN showed little concern about the fall in penguin numbers.
Climate change is a reason for the changes in the food chain of chinstrap penguins.
Gentoo penguins are not affected by climate change.

sections.section_instructions:
Complete the note below.

Choose ONLY ONE WORD from the passage for each answer.

content.paragraph:
The Greenpeace ship has been used to:
• record the {24} to marine life over the world.
• carry the {25} overseas.
• Build {26} to protect many surveyed colonies.
